name: surplus-repo
description: Javascript pre-processor that converts JSX syntax into inline DOM instructions

scripts.build: tsc -p src/runtime/tsconfig.json && tsc -p src/preprocessor/tsconfig.json && rollup packages\Surplus\es\Surplus.js -f "umd" -n "Surplus" -o .\packages\Surplus\index.js && rollup packages\surplus-preprocessor\es\preprocessor.js -f "umd" -n "SurplusPreprocessor" -o .\packages\surplus-preprocessor\index.js

author: Adam Haile
